full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GDUGS DKAR MCHOG GRUB MA BSTOD BZLOG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I GTZUG TOR NAS BYUNG BA'I GDUGS DKAR PO CAN GZHAN GYIS MI THUB PA PHYIR ZLOG PA CHEN MO MCHOG TU GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS NI,
